directions: Lightly toss avocados, tomatoes, red onion, cucumber, jalapeno, and corn in a salad bowl until well mixed, and sprinkle with garlic salt, salt, and black pepper.
Mix lime juice with olive oil in a small bowl, and pour over the salad. Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 small fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and diced
1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
salt and black pepper to taste
title: Guacamole Salad
